# Available metrics

# Example data `avacha`
The package comes with the mean daily water discharge values (`obs` in m^3/s) measured at the state gauging station Avacha River â€” Elizovo City (site No. 2090). Alongside with the measured water discharge, the mean water discharge in the last 24 hours derived from the GloFAS-ERA5 v4.0 reanalysis is provided (`sim`).

```{r}
#| fig-cap: Avacha River - Elizovo City hydrograph
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyhydro)
data(avacha)

avacha |>
  ggplot(aes(x = date)) +
  geom_line(aes(y = obs, color = "Measured")) +
  geom_line(aes(y = sim, color = "Predicted")) +
  scale_color_brewer(name = "", palette = "Set1") +
  labs(x = "", y = "Water Discharge, m3/s")

```
